App State Mode
Draw Shape
Controls

1. Press Q to toggle App State Mode, possible modes: IDLE, DRAWING, SELECTING

2. While in DRAWING state, click two points on the screen to draw LINE, SQUARE, or RECTANGLE. You can choose the item shape and color from the sidebar. There will be a visual line as a visual que to help you draw

3. If you're drawing for POLYGON, you can click any number of times and press ENTER after you're finished

4. While in SELECTING state, click on a shape to select it. There will be a visual points on the edge of the shape as a visual que to help you select

5. You can click one of the visual points and move your mouse (don't drag, just click once) to modify the shape

6. While selecting you can also change the shape's color

7. Click save to save your shapes

8. Click load and choose one of your CAD project to load it into the app

9. Click help to open this menu
